preqs: If students are enrolled in course 0503 there are no prerequisites. If students are enrolled in course 0748, 0790, 0826, 3843 or 4402 the prerequisite is AFX9500 or ACF5950.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {ACF5953, AFF9601, AFX4601, AFX9530}
For COURSE_CODE IN {0748, 0790, 0826, 3843, 4402, B6011} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACF5950, AFX9500} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} Otherwise true
Unit was previously coded {ACF5953, AFF9601, AFX4601, AFX9530}
(Must be enrolled in course version {0503, 0748, 0790, 0826, 1822, 3843, 4401, 4402, 4435, B6002, B6011} and Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 11, 42, 50PG})
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACF5950, AFX9500} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: An overview of the Australian financial reporting and regulatory framework for reporting entities, including an analysis of the relevant significant accounting standards, benchmarking against the conceptual framework, professional reporting requirements and stock exchange requirements. Financial reporting for corporate groups (including the impact of control, joint control and significant influence) and selected issues in financial reporting are also explored and benchmarked against the conceptual framework.
